description:
My webOS Apps is an indispensable tool for people writing webOS apps to keep track of their apps in Palm's App Catalog. 

Get notifications when your app is released, view the download count and user rating for each app. 

View a graph of downloads for each app over time - that's the real download count, not including updates. 

See your downloads in daily, weekly and monthly charts.

Sent Twitter updates about your apps, both manually and automatically.  Whenever an app is published, automatically tweet it to your followers using a customized message.

View comments for each app, and a timeline of all events on your account, from submission and review to publishing.

Follow your webOsDev forum posts, with active posts marked for viewing.

Once you install My webOS Apps, you'll wonder how you ever did without it.

--------------------------
v1.3.4 Fixes it to work with latest dev portal changes
versionNote: v1.3.4 Fixes it to work with latest dev portal changes
